title: COVID-19 Updates
author: Beaumont Health
description: As the new coronavirus, COVID-19, continues to evolve, Beaumont Health in Michigan is taking multiple steps to help reduce the spread of the disease. Learn more.
cleaned_text: new COVID-19 variant](/health-wellness/blogs/what-to-know-about-the-new-covid-19-variant) The newest COVID-19 variant, XBB.1.5, is circulating across the United States right now and is rising in Michigan. While most people won't know which variant they have, they should follow the same precautions as they did with previous variants of the virus. What to know about the new COVID-19 variant /health-wellness/blogs/what-to-know-about-the-new-covid-19-variant 1/27/2023 2:03:25 PM 1/27/2023 2:03:25 PM Beaumont Health [ ](/health-wellness/blogs/what-to-know-about-the-new-covid-19-variant) What to know about the new COVID-19 variant
